roleset.name: treasured

role.descr: Entity who holds arg1 as precious (Gollum)

example.name: arg1
example.text: Since the bears are scarce , bear bile is precious .

example.name: Obligatory LOTR example
example.text: I will admit that when I get a new airgun , I become just a little tiny bit like Gollum : my latest acquisition become ? precious ? to me .

roleset.note: PRECIOUS-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6. (from precious.01-j)

roleset.name: overwrought, tedious, contrived

role.descr: creation that is overwrought, contrived, tedious

example.name: arg1
example.text: The slightly rough , textured look has strength and depth without being overly precious .

example.name: both args
example.text: But when you 're making a story with any sort of dramatic clout , even a largely humorous one , I do n't think it pays to be gutless . Both in terms of reader reaction , fear of sparking sadness , anger , or bad reviews , and in terms of *PRO* being overly precious with your characters and ideas , to the point where it becomes obvious you 're unwilling to mess with anything or put anyone important in real danger , which does a lot to kill suspense .

propbank.arg: to the point where it becomes obvious you 're unwilling to mess with anything or put anyone important in real danger , which does a lot to kill suspense

example.name: both args
example.text: One of the biggest time wasters with mind mapping is *PRO* being overly precious with your drawings .

roleset.note: PRECIOUS-J NOTES: Added by Julia. (from precious.02-j)
